sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import Message from "../components/Message"; import CheckOutSteps from "../components/CheckOutSteps"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import {} from '../actions' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce( (acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0 ); cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 399 ? 0 : 99; cart.taxPrice = Number(0.01 * cart.itemsPrice); cart.totalPrice=Number(cart.itemsPrice)+Number(cart.shippingPrice)+Number(cart.taxPrice); const placeOrderHandler = () => {}; return (

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems === 0 ? ( Your Cart Is Empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x Rs. {item.price}=Rs. {item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items Rs. {cart.itemsPrice} Shipping Rs. {cart.shippingPrice} Tax Rs. {cart.taxPrice} Price Rs. {cart.totalPrice} ); }; export default PlaceOrderScreen;
